titles.title: MP1144 Your love is better than wine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your love is better than wine,
Your name like sweetest perfume;
Oh, that You would kiss me
With the kisses of Your mouth
And draw me, draw me after You.
I hear You whisper my name,
And like a moth to the flame
I fly into the fire of Your intimate love
As You draw me, draw me after You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So amazing, so divine,
I am your and You are mine.
For such love there are now words,
'Cause loving You is heaven on earth,
'Cause loving You is heaven on earth,

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Draw me after You, (x3)
And let us run together.
(Repeat)
